channel.title: Need skilling help

item.title: Need skilling help
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

Problem 1:

if((itemUsed == 946 && useWith == 1521))//Fletching for Oak Shortbow(u) { if(playerLevel[9] > 14) { setAnimation(885); deleteItem(1521, getItemSlot(1521), 1); addItem(54, 1); addSkillXP(800, 9); sendMessage("You carve an Unstrung Oak Shortbow"); } else { sendMessage("You need at least 15 Fletching to carve an Unstrung Oak Shortbow"); } }
You might have that in your main server file (client.java) And what your looking for in there is the line ‘addSkillXP(800, 9);’
the 800 is the amount of exp, the 9 is the skill where the exp is going.

Problem 2:
The same as problem 1, only for a different item on item.

Problem 3:
CBA to write it out atm, i might do it later.

Problem 4:
Again, same as 1 & 2, onyl searching for different things.

Read full topic
